home.title: We are Office Portfolio
home.home.Description: A dedicated collective of specialists, project managers and specifiers with shared passions and ideals - furniture consultancy, procurement and ongoing support,
home.descriptionYelow: offering a high-quality resource and service.

whyChooseUs.whyChooseUs.title: Why select Office Portfolio as your furniture supplier?

whatwedo.Whatwedo.title: What We Do
whatwedo.whatwedo.description: Understanding you, your culture and concept. Creating futureproofed inspiring solutions.
whatwedo.our.commitment.description: Office Portfolio are dedicated to providing our clients thehighest levels of customer service. This is maintained with constant monitoring and development of our company and staff accredited to ISO 9001:2015 for our Quality Management System, ISO 14001:2015 for our Environmental Management System, Constructionline and ISO 45001:2018 for our Health & Safety Policy.
whatwedo.our.commitment.description.two: We are committed to supplying products from manufacturers that hold a minimum of ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 accreditation. We have an all-inclusive in-house HSQE Management System in place, independently audited, to ensure compliance.

project.home.project.title: Recent projects
project.project.page.title: Project
project.project.page.description: Browse a selection of our recent office space design and furniture installation projects for your own inspiration across a range of industries.

contact.description: Our professional team are here to help, you can contact us on the details below or drop us a message using the form.
contact.team.contact.title: Speak to our specialist furniture consultants
contact.team.contact.description: Get in touch to find out how we can bring your ideas to life.
